document.full_text: the financial times is launching a new, web-based version of its mobile app, the first of its kind by a major publisher, that will allow it to adapt quickly to new tablet pcs and reduce its dependence on apple inc.
document.title: ft launches web-based app to work on all tablets
lines_and_colors: the financial times is launching a new, web-based version of its mobile app, the first of its kind by a major publisher, that will allow it to adapt quickly to new tablet pcs and reduce its dependence on apple inc.
